text: 7.5% Autosomal recessive inheritance - Bifid uvula - Broad femoral neck - Camptodactyly of finger - Cigarette-paper scars - Delayed eruption of teeth - Dental malocclusion - Flat capital femoral epiphysis - High palate - Hypodontia - Irregular vertebral endplates - Joint laxity - Metaphyseal widening - Moderately short stature - Osteopenia - Pes planus - Short femoral neck - Short metacarpal - Short phalanx of finger - Thenar muscle atrophy - Waddling gait - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) h
